name: Snail Detective
description:
Welcome to the Sheridan Hotel Snail Detective. The owner of this hotel, Mr. Sheridan, was found dead last night. Who committed this foul deed? Is murder the only crime afoot? What does pasta sauce have to do with anything? It's up to you to solve the case!

There are five shady suspects to choose from; the mysterious man, the assistant manager, the chef, the beautiful actress and the maid. Choose wisely, or your reputation as the great Snail Detective will be in tatters. 

Move around with the arrows or wasd keys.  Talk to the suspects again when you find new evidence, they might have more to say to you. 

This is a short murder mystery game made in Bitsy with the help of Borksy for the Feb 2019 #bitsyjam with the theme of snails.
